at.ac.tuwien.mmue_lm7.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.mmue_lm7.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the main game, accessible globally via singleton pattern
    Author:
    simon
